New Records: Nicholas Pooran's 98 off 53 balls is a new record for the fastest 98 in T20Is
Azmatullah Omarzai's 36 runs in an over is the joint most expensive over in T20Is
Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran hit three sixes and two fours in the first over against Azmatullah Omarzai
Naveen-ul-Haq dismissed Johnson Charles for a duck
Johnson Charles hit 44 runs in his innings
Azmatullah Omarzai bowled a record 36-run over in the powerplay
Nicholas Pooran hit back-to-back sixes in the last over off Naveen
Obed McCoy took three wickets for Afghanistan
Pre-Game Insights: Nicholas Pooran set the tone early for a dominant batting display from West Indies
Johnson Charles had two ducks and a 44 heading into the game
Afghanistan's middle order (Nos. 3 to 6) averaged a mere 19.71 with the openers Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran doing the heavy-lifting in the big wins against New Zealand and Uganda
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies registered their second-biggest win in T20 World Cups (by runs)
West Indies head into the Super Eight stage with a clean slate
Nicholas Pooran's leg side was the longer boundary, and Rashid bowling full only helped his cause
Johnson Charles started cautiously but found his rhythm mid-innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pooran's innings helped West Indies to 218 for 5, which was 104 too many for Afghanistan
Azmatullah Omarzai's 36 runs in an over is the joint most expensive over in T20Is
Nicholas Pooran surpassed Chris Gayle to become the leading six-hitter for West Indies in T20Is
Others: Gulbadin Naib misfielded one at sweeper cover in the 17th over
Naveen-ul-Haq's change of pace was too much for Johnson Charles
Rashid and his spin twin Noor Ahmad used the slight purchase from the surface to tie the batters down
